prelude.value: As the South Florida Community grows and evolves we wanted to start recording what that growth looks like and better understanding the designers that make up our community. As designers we know taking a deeper look into who we are serving and designing comes first before anything else and that goes double when looking into our own community.

sections.text: This section contains the makeup of our community. What type of designers exist in this community when we take a step back to look? Broken into gender, age, and ethnicity we can start to see where our community could make more efforts to educate and grow groups within the community even more so.
This section breaks down the career details of our designers and what type of work they are currently doing in the day to day.
